methods.name: schema_update
methods.summary: Request to sync after a schema change
methods.description: Notify the data explorer to do a state sync after a schema change.

methods.name: data_update
methods.summary: Clear cache and request fresh data
methods.description: Triggered when there is any data change detected, clearing cache data and triggering a refresh/redraw.

methods.summary: Return async result of get_column_profiles request
methods.description: Return async result of get_column_profiles request

params.name: profiles
params.description: Array of individual column profile results
